Claim: "A man wearing a black hat and coat makes a face with a crowd behind him."
Implication: "A guy is standing near a crowd of people."
Formula: (exists a (exists b (IsWearing(a,b) and (MakesFace(a) and IsInCrowd(a)))) & (forall f (forall e (forall d (  IsInCrowd(d) ->   IsNear(e,f))))) & (forall i (forall h (forall g (  IsNear(g,h) ->   IsInCrowd(i)))))) -> (exists c (exists b (IsStanding(b) and IsNear(b,c))))
